text: Hermann Monter (13 December 1926 – 23 September 1999) was a German footballer who played for SV Saar 05 Saarbrücken and the Saarland national team as a forward. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:1999 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:SV Saar 05 Saarbrücken players Category:Association football forwards
title: Hermann Monter
